fields.label: Let's Get Started
fields.content: First you should read and agree with the Creative Commons Global Network site Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Service

Read here:
Creative Commons Global Network Site Terms of Service

Privacy Policy

fields.label: Your Name
fields.description: The name people know you by.

fields.label: Brief Biography
fields.description: Tell us about yourself. You can include links and references.

fields.label: Brief Statement of Interest
fields.description: Tell us why you would like to become a member of the Creative Commons Global Network.

fields.label: Areas of Interest
fields.description: Which activities of the Global Network are you interested in participating in?

fields.label: Languages
fields.description: Which languages do you speak?

fields.label: Location
fields.description: Your current or usual location, for better connection with Chapters later.

fields.label: Nationality
fields.description: The country that you are a citizen of. We're sorry to have to ask.

fields.label: Social Media and URLs
fields.description: How can people find out more about you and contact you online? These will be public if your application is successful.

fields.label: Photo for Avatar
fields.description: A photograph of you to go on your profile. You can add one later if you prefer. (Maximum size 256KB).

fields.label: How To Choose People To Vouch For You
fields.content:
You must choose at least two people to vouch for you. You can choose more, which may help you to get voucher more quickly, but you do not have to do so.

These should be people who know you and can confirm that you are a good candidate to be a member of the Creative Commons Global Network

If you don't know someone's username, you can use this site's search function or you can ask them.

fields.label: Pre-Approval
fields.description: Do you approve this applicant to proceed to the vouching stage?

fields.label: Reason
fields.description: Please explain the reason for your decision. This will not be made available to the applicant but will be visible to other Administrators.

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.

fields.label: Reason
fields.description: If you have overridden the Vouchers' opinion provide a reason here. This will not be visible to the Applicant or to the Vouchers but will be visible to other Administrators.

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.

fields.label: Instructions
fields.content:
This person is applying to become an individual Member of the Creative Commons Global Network. They have asked you to vouch for them.

If you know them (online, offline, in person or by reputation) and feel that they would make a good Member of the Global Network, you should select "Yes" below.

If you do not know them or do not feel that they would make a good Member of the Global Network, you should select "No" below instead.

In either case we would be grateful if you would write a comment about this person. It will not be revealed to them or made public at any point, but it will help us to approve or deny their application.

fields.label: Do You Vouch For This Person?
Reason
fields.description: For example, how you know them and what are their contributions to the commons, or if you do not know them.

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.

choices.text: I have read and agree with the Charter
choices.value: I have read and agree with the Charter

inputs.label: I have read and agree with the Charter

fields.label: Signature
fields.description: Enter your name here to confirm that you have read and agree with the Charter.

fields.label: Institution Name
fields.description: The name of the institution applying for membership.

fields.label: Institution Web Site
fields.description: The institution's web site address (e.g. https://theinstitution.org/).

fields.label: Representative's Name
fields.description: Your name, as the representative of this Institution for the Global Network.

fields.label: Representative's Email Address
fields.description: Your email address, as the representative of this Institution for the Global Network.

fields.label: Existing Individual Members
fields.description: The usernames or emails of members of your organization who are already Individual Members of the Global Network

fields.label: Statement of Interest
fields.description: A brief summary of why your organisation wants to be an Institutional Member and who from your organisation will be involved.

fields.label: Is Your Organization Currently a CC Affiliate?
Affiliate Assets
fields.description: Please identify which of these your organization currently has with Creative Commons.

fields.label: Affiliate Domain Name
fields.description: The domain name that your organisation has under an agreement with Creative Commons.

fields.label: Additional Information
fields.description: Any additional information you would like to provide to support your organisation's application to join the Global Network.

confirmations.name: Default Confirmation
confirmations.message: Thanks for contacting us! We will get in touch with you shortly.
